Articles.Content:
Hi,

I may have found a bug with the Administration building's pool

I dont know if this has already been reported or if it just happens in my computer.

The Admin building is lvl 2.

I run some mods but none about textures

Can someone please confirm if this happens on stock?

It looks like someone forgot to add texture between the pool and the Admin grounds

Edited August 31, 2015 by Kaezan

Have you tried restarting?

Sometimes a terrain texture will become smeared out on one axis, it looks to me that it is being scaled to infinity, it's harmless and in some places it doesn't look too bad.

I can see in your pic that the texture is there otherwise you wouldn't see any green at all.

Restarted.

Problem still there.

I think im looking at the ksc grounds texture, below the building

Edited August 31, 2015 by Kaezan
added other image, daytime
